nodes.text: TR-350 was a T-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid who was part of Separatist scouting patrol on the planet Naboo that was attacked by members of the Royal Naboo Security Forces during the Clone Wars.

The T-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid TR-350 served in a Separatist scouting patrol on the planet Naboo during the Clone Wars. During an attack on the patrol by the Royal Naboo Security Forces, the droid was captured and had its photoreceptors removed at the Theed Royal Palace. There, the tactical droid was interrogated by C-3PO and Senator Padmé Amidala, who tried to trick him into thinking that he was aboard a Separatist vessel. TR-350 revealed the existence of a secret laboratory run by the scientist Nuvo Vindi before realizing it was in enemy hands. Before the Naboo could continue their interrogation, Junior Representative Jar Jar Binks accidentally toppled a series of shelves, which crushed the droid.

TR-350 first appeared in "Blue Shadow Virus," the seventeenth episode of the first season Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. The character's name first revealed in 2018 on a card in the mobile application Star Wars: Card Trader.
